items.title: Investors Bet Trump Will Make Europe Investable Again
items.description: The big hope is that Europe will move faster to implement reforms in the face of competitive threats from the U.S.

items.title: Base Metal Prices Rise; Copper Hits 10-Week Highs on Weaker Dollar
items.description: Base metal prices rose, with copper sitting at 10-week highs as the U.S. dollar weakened overnight on Trump’s comments.

items.title: Stock Futures Mixed With Amex, Verizon Earnings in Spotlight
items.description: U.S. stock futures wobbled while markets in China and Europe made gains.

items.title: MicroStrategy Suddenly Has a Tax Problem, and Needs Help From Trump's IRS
items.description: New rules could tax unrealized gains on bitcoin holdings at large companies.

items.title: Dollar's Falls After Trump's Tariff Remarks Could Prove Limited
items.description: The dollar was lower but its decline could prove to be limited after President Trump said he’d prefer not to impose new tariffs on China.
